ItemTooltips.quelling_blade:
If tou think that you won't get harassed that much, it will greatly help you to farm.
OTHERWISE, consider getting more regen instead
ItemTooltips.stout_shield: Must have, unless you are going on a trilane against a solo
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Late game boots. Almost must have on 50+ minute
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Some mobility + damage is always good
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Lifesteal if you don't plan buying a satanic at the late game, unless one of your teammates has it.
ItemTooltips.heart: Makes you even more tanky. Consider getting it ASAP if you don't have an intend on buying a BKB
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Must have in 95% of games. You need to land your hits, and you are not that tanky to survive several controls in a row in a teamfight.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: Take instead of BF if there is at least one hero with evasion in the enemy team (void excluded, windrunner included) or it's 30+ minute already
ItemTooltips.bfury: Good DPS item plus good farming boost
ItemTooltips.armlet: Main item of the build. Gives you 500 hp when activated, some regen, and dps. That HP boost will help you A LOT.
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator: Your main lifesteal, consider buying satanic in a lategame. Plus, if you have a BF, stacking your ancients with a dominated creep would be handy.
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: Buy instead of MKB if you feel that you need some sort of control if there are no heroes with evasion on the other team.

AbilityTooltips.phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger: Main farming skill, if things are getting tough
AbilityTooltips.phantom_assassin_blur: Great passive; Level it on your level 4 and forget about it for a while, that 20% are really great (though upgrading your other skills is a priority)
AbilityTooltips.phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace: The reason why you're playing PA.
